description:
Google AdWords can be an amazing tool the generate more business, however it can also generate huge sums of unwanted and unnecessary spend. I will teach you the tricks of the trade when it comes to online advertising so you don't have to make the mistakes that over 90% of business do make.

In this course you will learn the fundamentals of pay per click advertising from planning to optimisation via strategy, set-up, research, implementation, reporting and analysis. We also cover:

  • Planning, Preparation and Strategy of your Online Advertising Campaign
  • Setting up your first account, PPC campaign and your billing within Google Ad-words
  • Ability to research keywords, advertising copy and landing pages
  • Reporting on performance of your advertising Campaigns
  • Optimisation of your campaigns
title: Google AdWords Fundementals in under 1 hour
